title: cgo: Using 'import "C"' results in obscure errors when CGO_ENABLED=0
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
Go in OpenBSD can not see/access to public variables/functions.

When I run go test, it shows several files like:

./console_test.go:14: undefined: New

go version weekly.2012-03-27 +9a3c164b3231
openbsd 5.1
amd64
